foreignData.name: Beschleunigende Zecke
foreignData.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Die Beschleunigende Zecke verliert diese Fähigkeit, ist keine Kreatur mehr und wird zu einer Kreaturen-verzauberung, auf der steht: "Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält Erstschlag.". Lege die Beschleunigende Zecke auf die verzauberte Kreatur Deiner Wahl. Du kannst {W} bezahlen, um diesen Effekt wieder zu beenden.

name: Quickening Licid
originalText:
o1o
W, oc
T: Quickening Licid loses this ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "Enchanted creature gains first strike" instead of a creature. Move Quickening Licid onto target creature. You may pay o
W to end this effect.

rulings.text: Paying the cost to end the effect is a special action and can’t be responded to.

If a spell that can target enchantments but not creatures (such as Clear) is cast targeting the Licid after it has become an enchantment, but the Licid’s controller pays the cost, the Licid will no longer be an enchantment. This will result in the spell failing to resolve for having no legal targets.

text:
{1}{W}, {T}: Quickening Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {W} to end this effect.
Enchanted creature has first strike.
